Source code for Dedalus.exception.generic_error

import sys
import inspect

"""
Custom Exception, nicely formatted without traceback.
"""

__author__ = "Daniele Capocefalo, Mauro Truglio, Tommaso Mazza"

[docs]class NoTraceBackWithLineNumber(Exception):
    """
    Suppresses traceback details for exception of type Error
    """

    def __init__(self, msg):
        try:
            ln = sys.exc_info()[-1].tb_lineno
        except AttributeError:
            ln = inspect.currentframe().f_back.f_lineno
        self.args = "{0.__name__} (line {1}): {2}".format(type(self), ln, msg),
        sys.exit(self)




[docs]class Error(NoTraceBackWithLineNumber):
    pass
